snippet: Roger Hertog helped pull the New-York Historical Society back from the brink of bankruptcy and rejuvenate it as a modern institution offering important and engaging exhibitions.
abstract: Roger Hertog helped pull the New-York Historical Society back from the brink of bankruptcy and rejuvenate it as a modern institution offering important and engaging exhibitions; he remains personally invested in the society’s mission: to relate the history of the country, through the prism of New York, from its founding through the present.
lead_paragraph: Roger Hertog helped pull the New-York Historical Society back from the brink of bankruptcy and rejuvenate it as a modern institution offering important and engaging exhibitions.
